%Folk = ( 'YY', 'Yon Yonson', 'TC', 'Terra Cotta', 'RE', 'Ron Everly' ); %State = ( 'YY', 'Wisconsin', 'TC', 'Minnesota', 'RE', 'Bliss' ); %Job = ( 'YY', 'work in a lumbermill', 'TC', 'teach nuclear physics', 'RE', 'watch football'); foreach $person ( 'TC', 'YY', 'RE' ) { print "My name is $Folk{$person},\n", "I live in $State{$person},\n", "I $Job{$person} there.\n\n"; } open (LOGFILE, ">>index.html"); print LOGFILE "do you see anything?\n";
